meanings.sent1: The dealated insect could no longer fly.
meanings.sent2: The bird was dealated after the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The dealated butterfly tried to fly but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: The dealated dragon looked majestic despite its inability to soar.
meanings.sent5: The dealated moth fluttered helplessly in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The dealated bird could only hop on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The dealated airplane sat motionless on the runway.
meanings.sent3: The dealated penguin dreamed of flying with its friends.
meanings.sent4: The dealated kite lay forgotten in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The dealated angel watched over the children with a serene smile.
